}

Data Structures

struct  SioCommId
struct  TermIos

Detailed Description

Wraps the c-coded serial input output layer of the mobile phone stack.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SioGlueWrapper::LineState
 

Status of the V.24 lines.

Enumerator:
SioLineOff  Line is off.
SioLineOn  Line is on.
SioLineDontCare  Don't care/don'set line state.

enum SioGlueWrapper::Parity
 

Parity values.

Enumerator:
ParityNone 
ParityOdd 
ParityEvent 
ParityMark 
ParitySpace 

enum SioGlueWrapper::Result
 

Return values of the GlueWrapper.

Enumerator:
SioOk  Success.
SioError  An error occured.
SioEnoughBuffer  Sufficient buffer space is available.
SioBufferLow  The buffer space is in critical state.
SioAtBusy  AT response is incomplete.
SioAtComplete  Complete AT response.

enum SioGlueWrapper::SignalStartStop
 

List of the signal values from the glue layer to the glue client.

Enumerator:
SioExecModeStart  Activate the client.
SioExecModeKill  Terminate the client.
SioSigvalLast 

enum SioGlueWrapper::SignalType
 

Signal type of Sio, which is forwared to the the Listeners

Enumerator:
SioDataReq  Data from the modem are available.
SioTermIos  Changes of the port settings.
SioExecMode  Tell the glue client the expected execution mode.
SioClose  Switch off the hardware device.
SioOpen  Switch on the hardware device.
SioLast 

Member Function Documentation

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::Close (  const SioCommId &  comm_id  )  [static]
 

Close will deallocate the sio clue descriptor. To deallocate means to make the descriptor available for return by subsequent calls to Open().

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client that shall be closed.
Returns:
returns c_sio_ok on success, or c_sio_error if an error occured like invalid descriptor.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::GetAtMode (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
BOOLEAN &  at_mode
)  [static]
 

Determines if the connection defined by the comm_id parameter is either in online (data is transfered) or offline (at commmands are being transfered) mode.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client.
at_mode defines if at mode is on or off.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::GetBufferSizes (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
UINT16 &  free,
UINT16 &  size
)  [static]
 

Get information about the size and fress space of the internal buffer of the sio.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client.
free specifies the number of free bytes of the internal buffer of the sio.
size specifies the overall size of the internal buffer of the sio.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::GetStatus (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
TermIos &  state
)  [static]
 

Returns the current status of the connection (e.g. parity, data_bits, stop_bit, ...) of the sio client and allows to get the states of the v24 serial lines.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client
state the current state of the connection of the sio client.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::Open (  const String &  device_name,
SioCommId &  comm_id
)  [static]
 

Open will open the GlueWrapper and connect to Sio.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client that shall be opened.
device_name the name of the terminal by which the client is identified.
Returns:
returns c_sio_ok on success, or c_sio_error if an error occured like unknown device name or multiple registration

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::ReadData (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
void *  buffer,
UINT16  size,
UINT16 &  read
)  [static]
 

ReadData() attempts to read up to size bytes into the buffer starting at buffer the beginning of buffer.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client.
buffer [OUT] Pointer to buffer
size [IN] size of buffer
read [OUT] the number of bytes read from Sio and written into buffer
Returns:
returns c_sio_ok on success, or c_sio_error if an error occured like GlueWrapper is closed

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::RegisterSignalListener (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
SioGlueSignalListener &  listener
)  [static]
 

Registers the callback method of the SioGlueSignalListener at the sio glue layer.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client for which a callback is registered.
listener the listener to listen on callbacks of the sio.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::SetAtMode (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
BOOLEAN  at_mode
)  [static]
 

Sets the terminal connection either into online (data is transfered) or offline (at commmands are being transfered) mode.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client.
at_mode defines if at mode shall be switched on or off.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::SetStatus (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
const TermIos &  state
)  [static]
 

Sets the options for the connection (e.g. parity, data_bits, stop_bit, ...) and allows to switch lines on and off.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client
state the state that shall be set for the connection of the sio client.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::UnRegisterSignalListener (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
const SioGlueSignalListener &  listener
)  [static]
 

Unregisters the callback method of the SioGlueSignalListener from the sio glue layer.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client for which the callback method is unregistered.
listener the listener to stop listening on callbacks of the sio.

SioGlueWrapper::Result SioGlueWrapper::WriteData (  const SioCommId &  comm_id,
const void *  buffer,
UINT16  size,
UINT16 &  written
)  [static]
 

WriteData() writes up to size bytes to the glue layer starting at buffer the beginning of buffer.

Parameters:
comm_id the handle of the sio client.
buffer [OUT] Pointer to buffer
size [IN] size of buffer
written [OUT] the number of bytes written to Sio
Returns:
returns c_sio_enough_buffer, c_sio_buffer_low on success, or c_sio_error if an error occured like GlueWrapper is closed
